cards.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a shield or pay {2}.
Flying
Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is the number of creatures attacking you. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

cards.notes:
ALT — Enchant aura
Enchant creature or land
Enchanted permanent is a land with “T: Add one mana of any of this permanent's colors” and loses all other abilities. (It's no longer a creature.)

cards.rules_text:

cards.flavor_text: [i]Never start a fire in the depths of the forest. Enraged red-eye scorpions will come after you.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When this creature attacks, creatures with power less than this creature can't block creatures you control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]A stampeding longhorn leaves nothing but dust in its wake.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
This creature's power is equal to the number of insects you control.
At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Insect token.
cards.flavor_text: [i] A Colony Beetle's spawning is a virtual nightmare. It covers the earth with a hail of its bullet-like eggs.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Trample
When this creature enters, you may shield up to one target creature you own and control and up to one target land you own and control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Sometimes weeks pass before it realizes it has a gored enemy stuck to its horns.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card or a card with shield trigger, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.rules_text: When this creature enters the battlefield, return another target creature to its owner's hand and draw a card. If this targets a creature you own and control, you may shield it instead and draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]It attacks anything that enters its territory, even Leviathans.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever this creature enters or attacks, you may return target creature to its owner's hand if its power is less than this creature's power.

cards.rules_text: Return all nonland permanents target player controls to their owner's hand.

cards.rules_text:
Tropico can't be blocked while you control two or more other creatures.

cards.flavor_text: [i]“I will lead you into battle.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
While you have one or more shields, you do not lose the game for having 0 or less life.
Your opponent's can attack this shield. If one or more creatures attack it and are not blocked, put it into your hand at the end of the declare blockers step. [i](Put the card onto the battlefield face-down under its owner's control. Their opponents can attack it. If they do, and a creature attacking it isn't blocked, add the shielded card to its owner's hand.)[/i]

cards.flavor_text:
[i]You can cover a face-down shielded card with this reminder card.
Your opponents can attack this card. If they do and at least one attacker isn't blocked, put it into your hand at the end of the declare blockers step.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
Whenever you shield one or more cards, tap enchanted creature and its controller mills 2.
cards.flavor_text: [i]No mouth. Big bite. [/i]
cards.notes:
As creature:
This creature can't be blocked if you control three or more shields.
